name: Spacetime Gravity Adventure
description:
press spacebar to switch gravity and get through the level into the goal without getting stuck or falling out

Jiri Sustr - student ID: 2129577 - Level design, programming

Max Ottesen - student ID: 2089319 - Sprites and texts (even the space core), sound and animation programming
